description: This file defines the NotesController class, which implements REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes within a notes application. It handles listing, retrieving by id, creating, updating, and deleting notes via HTTP requests, utilizing an injected note service.

classes.name: NotesController
classes.description: Controller class providing API endpoints for notes CRUD operations, using dependency-injected service and logger.

methods.name: GetAllAsync
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all notes, ordered by last updated date descending.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note with provided data.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note identified by id.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by id.
